name: KickGum
description:
BEST ENJOYED IN DOWNLOADABLE VERSION - better graphics, post processing, good fps. WebGL version lacks all of it.

Objectives:

  • Throw green boxes into the cooldown system to prevent reactor explosion
  • Reach the highest score!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move (sorry weird non-qwerty people we didn’t have time)
  • LShift - Dash
  • Space - Make everyone fall (why would you do that?)
  • R - Reload level
  • E - Pick Up/Put Down object
  • LMB - throw object
